column4: Hello there all. Can someone recommend a good media player to me? Also, what do I need to do to install a MP3 decoder? Do I only need Synaptic (set to the multiverse) or do I need something more?
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats -- instructions on what you need to install / do to get that working.
Sure thing!  (It's a long document, pleanty of instructions, and all step-by-step).
